title: Italian Quorn Pasta Bake
ingredients: ['800g passata', '1 teaspoon dried basil', '1 teaspoon extra-virgin olive oil', '4 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 pinch white pepper', '225g fusilli pasta', '1 (240g) packet breaded Quorn goujons', '60g mozzarella cheese, grated']
